name: The Forest Warrior Beta Version
description:
The Forest Warrior is a Metroidvania genre game developed in 2023 developed by Emefem Studio. This game tells the story of a warrior who dared to risk his life to treat his teacher who was suffering from a rare disease. Players can run, jump over obstacles, and carry out attacks on enemies in front of them. This warrior can store weapons found along the way and even combine them into new and more powerful weapons with the knowledge that warriors have mastered to fight tribal tribes and wild animals.

This game can only be run on computers and laptops that use Windows, Mac and Linux. open the .txt file for further information after extracting The Forest Warrior that you downloaded earlier.

stay tuned for the next project.

Thank you for your attention.
